attributes.action: speaker of the House of Commons get prime minister to answer questions properly
attributes.additional_details: To hold the government to account for its actions and decisions
attributes.background: I want the prime minister to actually answer a question put to him instead of the waffle and avoidance. I find pmq’s are a waste of taxpayers money because the prime minister doesn’t provide accurate answers tax payers are entitled to know.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker, and Members are responsible for their answers to questions.
